channel.title: Scar
channel.description:
:mad: SCAR won't work for me for some reason. I do the instructions, go on runescape, do what the script tells me, and then i hit run. My mouse just moves and won't stop and runescape still won't bot my person!!!!!! The point is..
[size=50pt]WE NEED A SCAR TUTORIAL!! [/size]
So people, post here "EVERYTHING" you know about SCAR.

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @chrishead168 Chrishead168
item.description:
@chrishead168 wrote:

its called go to www.moparisthebest.org/smf then click on SCAR tutorials and there you have it

Read full topic
